sentence: The  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  says  that  they  mistakenly  killed  three  hostages  being  held  in  Gaza  .
Reports  came  in  on  Friday  that  an  Al  Jazeera  journalist  was  killed  in  a  missile  strike  in  Khan  Younis.

The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  that  more  than  18,800  people  are  now  known  to  have  been  killed  since  Israel  launched  its  retaliatory  campaign  after  the  7  October  Hamas  attack  on  Israel.
